title: Ken Kellett
text:
Kenneth Kellett ( – ) was a professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1970s and 1980s. He played at club level for <a href="Fryston%20A.R.L.F.C.">Fryston</a> <a href="Fryston%20ARLFC">ARLFC</a> and <a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Featherstone%20Rovers%20players">Heritage № 499</a>), as a , i.e. number 2 or 5.
Playing career.
Kellett made his début for <a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a> on Tuesday 29 September 1970, and he played his last match for Featherstone Rovers during the <a href="1982%E2%80%9383%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season">1982–83 season</a>.
Championship appearances.
Kellett played in <a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a>' victory in <a href="Rugby%20Football%20League%20Championship">Championship</a> during the <a href="1976%E2%80%9377%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season">1976–77 season</a>.
Challenge Cup Final appearances.
Kellett played , i.e. number 5, in <a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a>' 33-14 victory over <a href="Bradford%20Bulls">Bradford Northern</a> in the <a href="1973%20Challenge%20Cup">1973 Challenge Cup</a> Final during the <a href="1972%E2%80%9373%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season%23Challenge%20Cup">1972–73 season</a> at <a href="Wembley%20Stadium%20%281923%29">Wembley Stadium</a>, <a href="London">London</a> on Saturday 12 May 1973, in front of a crowd of 72,395, and played in the 14-12 victory over <a href="Hull%20F.C.">Hull F.C.</a> in the <a href="1983%20Challenge%20Cup">1983 Challenge Cup</a> Final during the <a href="1982%E2%80%9383%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season%23Challenge%20Cup">1982–83 season</a> at <a href="Wembley%20Stadium%20%281923%29">Wembley Stadium</a>, <a href="London">London</a> on Saturday 7 May 1983, in front of a crowd of 84,969.
County Cup Final appearances.
Kellett played , i.e. number 5, in <a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a>' 12-16 defeat by <a href="Leeds%20Rhinos">Leeds</a> in the <a href="1976%20Yorkshire%20Cup">1976</a> <a href="RFL%20Yorkshire%20Cup">Yorkshire</a> <a href="Rugby%20league%20county%20cups">County Cup</a> Final during the <a href="1976%E2%80%9377%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season">1976–77 season</a> at <a href="Headingley%20Stadium%23Rugby%20ground">Headingley</a> <a href="Headingley%20Rugby%20Stadium">Rugby Stadium</a>, <a href="Leeds">Leeds</a> on Saturday 16 October 1976, and played in the 7-17 defeat by <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford</a> in the <a href="1977%20Yorkshire%20Cup">1977</a> <a href="RFL%20Yorkshire%20Cup">Yorkshire</a> <a href="Rugby%20league%20county%20cups">County Cup</a> Final during the <a href="1977%E2%80%9378%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season">1977–78 season</a> at <a href="Headingley%20Stadium%23Rugby%20ground">Headingley</a> <a href="Headingley%20Rugby%20Stadium">Rugby Stadium</a>, <a href="Leeds">Leeds</a> on Saturday 15 October 1977.
Testimonial match.
Kellett's <a href="Benefit%20%28sports%29">benefit</a> season at <a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a> took place during the <a href="1980%E2%80%9381%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season">1980–81 season</a>.
